description: Update a time card approval audit.
permissions: User must be an admin or a time card auditor for the time card broker.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (time card approval audit ID) and at least one attribute to update; with this command that means --note must be provided. Time card must be approved and must not be invoiced. User must be a valid auditor (admin or broker membership with time card auditor role for the time card broker). If is_bot is true, user must be blank; if is_bot is false, user must be present.

flags.name: --note
flags.validation: Optional, but at least one updatable attribute is required; if no fields are provided the command errors.
